messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

annual leave request going to the wrong person for approval sent monday february please review annual leave request for hi could you please check why below request came for approval part approving request for for your awareness won approve below request please speak with your manager or manager about request thank you manager mobile next vacations th th february sent monday february please review annual leave request for requested annual leave for working days february february please be aware period before annual leave starts less than days request must be approved otherwise request out before you please review annual leave allowance details days allowed days already taken days remaining amount annual leave requested give balance following remaining days exceed days you required request by selecting accept or decline option if you accept database be updated with information if you decline rejection reason be sent requestor regards guide for approving or rejecting request open or go tab link located top left side screen select requests menu option double click specific pending approval request list click view form button view request details modified fields marked with red asterisk hold your mouse over asterisk original field value enter your comments comments field authorize request by pressing accept or decline buttons for any or technical issues with please contact

message.reasoning:
**Generating JSON object**

I need to create a JSON-like category object based on the specified format. The instruction asks us to categorize the IT Ticket, so I must ensure the output is valid by including the category value. It seems that simply providing the category string isn't enough; I need to follow the schema with the correct property. The right output should indeed be {"category":"HR Support"}, keeping it concise and avoiding any extra text. I'll proceed with that!
